goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

Class GoalRepository<A extends Atom,U extends Update>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.GoalRepository<A,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - The type of atom that constitute goals occurring in this repository.
    U - The type of update that the goals occurring in this repository are represented by in the core interpreter.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrologGoalRepository

    public abstract class GoalRepository<A extends Atom,U extends Update>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a repository of goals.
    Author:
    sungshik
